data.title: Asia Market Open: Bitcoin Stuck at $86k as Bond Selloff and Japan Rate Hike Concerns Weigh on Markets
data.description: Bitcoin traded around $86,000 at the Asia open on Tuesday, as a sharp slide in cryptocurrencies and a global bond selloff kept traders defensive and capped gains in regional stocks.The world’s largest cryptocurrency remains a key barometer of risk appetite, and sentiment turned fragile after it slumped more than 5% ...
data.keywords: Japan, Bitcoin miners, basis points, Asia
